response_deadline: 4 business days (with extensions allowed for complex requests)
notes: 4 business day response deadline. Must provide cost estimate, denial with reasons, or extension explanation. Liberal construction for fiscal records. Recent amendments effective January 1, 2025.

basic_request.subject: Nebraska Public Records Request
basic_request.body:
Dear Records Custodian:

Pursuant to the Nebraska Public Records Act, Nebraska Revised Statutes § 84-712.01, I respectfully request access to inspect and copy the following public records:

[SPECIFIC DESCRIPTION OF RECORDS]

Please respond within four business days of receipt as required by law, providing either:
1. Cost estimate and access/copies of records
2. Written denial with specific statutory citations if access is denied
3. Written explanation with earliest practicable fulfillment date if request is extensive

If any portion of this request is denied, please provide a description of withheld contents and specific reasons for denial with statutory citations as required by § 84-712.04.

I prefer to receive responsive records electronically when possible to minimize costs. Please contact me if clarification is needed.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
[YOUR NAME]
[YOUR ADDRESS]
[PHONE NUMBER]
[EMAIL ADDRESS]

appeal_template.subject: Appeal of Public Records Request Denial
appeal_template.body:
Dear Agency Head:

I am appealing the denial of my Nebraska Public Records Act request dated [DATE]. Your office denied my request for [DESCRIPTION OF RECORDS] citing [EXEMPTION CLAIMED].

I believe this denial is improper under Nebraska law because [LEGAL REASONING]. The Nebraska Public Records Act requires liberal construction, particularly for fiscal records, audit, warrant, voucher, invoice, purchase order, requisition, payroll, check, receipt, or other record involving public funds.

The requested records appear to be public records that should be disclosed under §§ 84-712 through 84-712.09. Please reconsider this denial and provide the requested records.

Sincerely,
[YOUR NAME]
